title.rendered: Weekly Meal Plan for Moderately Active Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 1

content.rendered:
In This Article

  • 1 Breakfast
  • 2 Lunch
  • 3 Snack
  • 4 Dinner

Breakfast

  • 2 Scrambled Eggs
  • 1 Whole-Wheat Toast
  • 1 cup Tea/Coffee

Lunch

  • 1 Grilled Eggplant Panini
  • 1 glass Flavor-Infused Water (try sliced cucumbers, strawberries and mint)

Snack

  • 1 small bowl Cherries with Ricotta & Toasted Almonds
  • 1 cup Chai Tea with unsweetened Almond Milk

Dinner

  • 1 serving Baked Chicken with Vegetables
  • 1 cup Quinoa
